ygData.subject: Re: The second incarnation of the Trueshot bow
ygData.msgSnippet: no first is right... but found out .. it will be in next patch.. so not in game yet... will be after the 12 th of oct.. in new sol temple zone later karver ps

no first is right... but found out .. it will be in next patch.. so not in
game yet... will be after the 12 th of oct.. in new sol temple zone
